entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's this VeloBand Pulse thing I bought. I'm not happy with it. It's just not working out.
I understand. I'm happy to help with a return. Can you provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your VeloFit account?
It's [customer's email address]. Look, I don't have a lot of time for this. I just want to send it back. It’s supposed to be a smart watch but it's not smart.

Okay, I have located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse. I understand your frustration, and we want you to be completely satisfied with your VeloFit purchase. According to our return policy, you have a generous 90 days to return items for a full refund.
90 days? Great! I was worried because I think I bought it maybe 15 days ago. So, can I just send it back now?

Absolutely! Since you are well within our 90-day return policy, I'm happy to process that return for you. I'll send you a prepaid shipping label to your email address. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse securely, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. What about the refund? How long will that take?

Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, we'll process your refund within 7-10 business days. You'll receive an email confirmation once the refund has been issued back to your original method of payment.
Perfect. Thank you so much! I appreciate the help. You made this so easy, I was expecting it to be a huge hassle. I will definitely buy another smart watch from VeloFit later.
You're very welcome! We're happy to help. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
